metadata.title: CVE-2023-37923 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple arbitrary write vulnerabilities exist in the VCD sorted bsearchfunctionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .vcd file can lead toarbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open a malicious file totrigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns the arbitrarywrite when triggered via the vcd2lxt conversion utility.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
